alert.note: Alert for Lee; Macon; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 3:14PM CDT until June 30 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lee County in east central Alabama... Eastern Macon County in southeastern Alabama... Russell County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 313 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Smiths to near Griffen Mill to near Auburn University, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Auburn, Phenix City, Tuskegee, Notasulga, Hurtsboro, Smiths, Smiths Station, Uchee, Lake Tuskegee, Auburn University, Tuskegee National Forest, Beauregard, Davisville, Russell County Sports Complex, Seale, Ladonia, Society Hill, Griffen Mill, Loachapoka and Warriorstand. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
